tool_name: DeltaGain - UK Company Data and Accounts
tool_description:
[BETA] Company Information for UK registered Companies inlcuding Company Financial Accounts, Mortages and Charges, Officers, Persons with Significant Controll, Shareholders, Group Structures and now - UK Land Owersnhip.  Accounts may contain a variety of financial information including Balance Sheet and Profile and Loss information.  Drop us a line with your use-case and API suggestions!

DeltaGain has over 4 Million companies in the database and approximately 10 million account records for o...
title: DeltaGain - UK Company Data and Accounts

api_list.name: Group (Owners and Subsidiaries )
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://deltagain.p.rapidapi.com/company/{company_number}/group"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "deltagain.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Basic
api_list.description: Information about a particular company, including name, registered office, accounts details, key dates and number of mortgages.  Over 4 Million records.
